sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import MoreOptionsBase from './MoreOptionsBase'; import MoreOptionsBonus from './MoreOptionsBonus'; import MoreOptionsEquity from './MoreOptionsEquity'; import MoreOptionsPerks from './MoreOptionsPerks'; export default class CalculatorControls extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { baseSalary: window.baseSalary, bonusAmount: window.bonusAmount, equityValue: window.equityValue, perksValue: window.perksValue, totalValue: window.totalValue }; } baseOnChange = (event) => { this.setState({baseSalary:event.target.value}); this.setState({totalValue: event.target.value + bonusAmount + equityValue + perksValue}); } render() { return (
${parseInt(window.totalValue)}
Total Value
${parseInt(this.state.baseSalary)} this.baseOnChange}/>
${parseInt(this.state.bonusAmount)} this.setState({bonusAmount: event.target.value})}/>
${parseInt(this.state.equityValue)} this.setState({equityValue: event.target.value})}/>
${this.state.perksValue} this.setState({perksValue: event.target.value})}/>
); } }
